title: Halden's Master Plan Revealed
outcome: As Stenograd spirals with the rise of scoreless districts, Oksana and Rada uncover Halden's true intent: the BCI was always meant to fail, exposing its flaws for all to see. They reveal Halden’s encrypted narrative logs, showing he orchestrated his own death to break the city’s dependence. The city embraces collective audits, rewriting its governance with transparency and open debate. The final Council members step down, and all authority over the BCI is dissolved—closing the era of governance by hidden hand.

events.description: Encrypted logs from Halden’s terminal are published, revealing his intention for BCI to fail so society could rebuild with open eyes.
Citywide debates break out as citizens use Halden’s narrative evidence to publicly review old BCI policies and collective Council decisions.
Majority of remaining Council members resign under public scrutiny, leaving no central authority to control city systems.
A people’s assembly votes to dissolve all remaining BCI controls. All scores are voided and governance is rewritten with citizen-led open audits.
